section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce, the judgment and opinion for the Court in 78-959, Perrin against United States.
And for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice White took no part in the decision of the case.
